      Creates JWT Bearer token.
      Parameters:
      prefix - Token prefix defined in TokenConfig class.
      key - Secret Secure key.
      tokenObject - Object with token information to use in JWT creation.

    • create

      public static TokenObject create(String token, String prefix, String key) throws io.jsonwebtoken.ExpiredJwtException, io.jsonwebtoken.UnsupportedJwtException, io.jsonwebtoken.MalformedJwtException, SignatureException
